prompts: Create a legendary ice-type Pokemon with majestic wings and a serene presence.
I want a Pokemon that embodies tranquility, featuring icy blue feathers and a graceful demeanor.
Generate a mythical bird Pokemon with frosty colors and an elegant, soaring pose.
Make an icy creature with a sleek body, long tail, and a powerful gaze.
Imagine a Pokemon with striking blue plumage, showcasing its legendary status and ice abilities.
Design a majestic flying Pokemon with shimmering blue wings and a calm aura.
Give me a beautiful ice-type Pokemon that resides in the mountains and exudes elegance.
